credit_line: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
title: Poster Design for British General Post Office: "Post Office"
description: A silhouette in profile facing left of the mythological god Mercury in his winged hat. A white "halo" surrounds the head, setting it off from a blue background. Red text, on 2 blue ribbon-shaped rectangles superimposed over head: " POST / OFFICE"
name: Drawing
